module.title: Admin: Module Installer
module.description: Install modules from module sources. Building on basic module administration, this module allows you to install modules from any defined module source. Installing a modules with needed but not installed related modules will install these needed modules as well. This module can be extended by: - Module Editor - Module Creator This module needs other modules to be installed: - Modules Editor (thus Modules, Module Sources, App Instances)
module.author: Christian Würker
